numbered_ace_sentences: 2. Some people do not have legacy status.
3. People who have legacy status have a higher admission rate than people who do not have legacy status.
4. Students who have legacy status have a higher income rate than people who do not have legacy status.
5. Some students have a lower income.
6. Some lower-income students do not have legacy status.
7. I wonder why some lower-income students who do not have legacy status still have a high acceptance rate.
11. Legacy status could impact our college acceptance rate.
12. The headline is: Legacy and Acceptance.
